data.text: Me ba, fa me nsɛm sie
Di mʼahyɛde so na wubenya nkwa;
Kyekyere bɔ wo nsateaa ho;
Ka kyerɛ nyansa se, “Woyɛ me nuabea,”
Wɔbɛtwe wo afi ɔbeawaresɛefo ho,
Me fi mfɛnsere ano,
Mihuu wɔ ntetekwaafo mu,
Na ɔnam borɔn a ɛbɛn ɔbea no fi so
bere a onwini redwo,
Afei ɔbea bi fi behyiaa no a
(Ɔyɛ hyirenn na hwee mfa ne ho,
nnɛ wohu no mmɔnten so, ɔkyena na ɔte aguabɔbea,
Osoo ne mu few nʼano,
“Mewɔ asomdwoe afɔrebɔde wɔ fie;
Enti mebae sɛ merebehyia wo;
Mato me mpa,
Mede nnuhuam apete me mpa so:
Bra, ma yɛmfa ɔdɔ mmɔ ɔdɔ mu nkosi anɔpa;
Me kunu nni fie;
Ɔde sika a ɛdɔɔso hyɛɛ ne sika kotoku ma
Ɔde tɛkrɛmakyene bɔɔ no adafa;
Odii nʼakyi prɛko pɛ
kosi sɛ bɛmma bɛwɔ ne brɛbo mu,
Na afei, me mma, muntie me;
Mommma mo koma mpatiri nkɔ no so
Bebree na wɔnam no so ahwehwe ase;
Ne fi yɛ ɔda tempɔn a
